title: Entra ID User
description: A user from Microsoft Entra ID

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: The name displayed in the address book for the user

given_name.title: Given Name
given_name.description: The given name (first name) of the user

surname.title: Surname
surname.description: The user's surname (family name or last name)

mail.title: Email
mail.description: The SMTP address for the user

user_principal_name.title: User Principal Name
user_principal_name.description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user

department.title: Department
department.description: The name for the department in which the user works

office_location.title: Office Location
office_location.description: The office location in the user's place of business

mobile_phone.title: Mobile Phone
mobile_phone.description: The primary cellular telephone number for the user

business_phones.title: Business Phones
business_phones.description: The telephone numbers for the user

account_enabled.title: Account Enabled
account_enabled.description: True if the account is enabled; otherwise, false

user_type.title: User Type
user_type.description: A string value that can classify user types

created_date_time.title: Created Date
created_date_time.description: The date and time the user was created

last_sign_in_date_time.title: Last Sign In
last_sign_in_date_time.description: The date and time of the user's last sign-in

assigned_licenses.title: Assigned Licenses
assigned_licenses.description: The licenses that are assigned to the user

title: Entra ID Group
description: A group/team from Microsoft Entra ID

display_name.title: Display Name
display_name.description: The display name for the group

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional description for the group

mail.title: Email
mail.description: The SMTP address for the group

mail_nickname.title: Mail Nickname
mail_nickname.description: The mail alias for the group

group_types.title: Group Types
group_types.description: Specifies the group type and its membership

security_enabled.title: Security Enabled
security_enabled.description: Specifies whether the group is a security group

mail_enabled.title: Mail Enabled
mail_enabled.description: Specifies whether the group is mail-enabled

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.description: Specifies the group join policy and group content visibility

created_date_time.title: Created Date
created_date_time.description: Timestamp of when the group was created

renewed_date_time.title: Renewed Date
renewed_date_time.description: Timestamp of when the group was last renewed

expiration_date_time.title: Expiration Date
expiration_date_time.description: Timestamp of when the group expires

member_count.title: Member Count
member_count.description: Number of members in the group

owner_count.title: Owner Count
owner_count.description: Number of owners of the group

title: Entra ID Group Member
description: A user's membership in an Entra ID group using dynamic path parameters
